title: Vivox Authorization Service
description: A Vivox authentication service is essential for integrating AccelByte Gaming Services (AGS), Vivox, and game clients. It generates the signed Vivox token that game clients need to interact with Vivox. This token is valid for 90 seconds, so game clients must regularly call the service to obtain a new token.
creator: AccelByte

repositories.title: Vivox Authorization Service - Go
repositories.description: Vivox authorization service implemented in Go

repositories.title: Vivox Authorization Service - C#
repositories.description: Vivox authorization service implemented in C#

repositories.title: Vivox Authorization Service - Java
repositories.description: Vivox authorization service implemented in Java

repositories.title: Vivox Authorization Service - Python
repositories.description: Vivox authorization service implemented in Python

title: Rank Suite
description: A comprehensive tiered weekly player ranking system for AccelByte Gaming Services (AGS) that manages MMR-based player rankings with real-time updates and weekly evaluations.
creator: AccelByte

repositories.title: Extend Rank Suite
repositories.description: Extend Rank Suite service implemented in Go with 3 services

title: Core Matchmaker
description: Extend Override app designed to customize the matchmaking function. It includes a gRPC server implementation with built-in security (authentication/authorization), observability (metrics, traces, logs), and a sample implementation for matching two players.
creator: AccelByte

repositories.title: Extend Core Matchmaker
repositories.description: Extend Override Core Matchmaker service implemented in Go

title: Challenge Suite
description: The Challenge Suite enables game developers to implement daily missions, seasonal events, quests, and achievements through simple JSON configuration - no custom backend code required. The system integrates seamlessly with AccelByte Gaming Services (AGS) for authentication, event processing, and reward distribution.
creator: AccelByte

repositories.title: Extend Challenge Suite
repositories.description: This is utility repo for running and testing the Extend Challenge apps

title: Profanity Filter
description: Profanity filter to check if a message contains blacklisted words
creator: GGWP

repositories.title: Profanity Filter
repositories.description: Profanity filter to check if a message contains blacklisted words

title: MMR Calculator
description: MMR Calculator processes match results and updates player MMR based on team performance, taking into account team composition and underdog scenarios. The service integrates with AccelByte's Statistics service for MMR persistence
creator: AccelByte

repositories.title: Extend MMR Calculator
repositories.description: Extend Service Extension sample app that can calculate player MMR changes given simple match result.

title: Gacha Suite
description: Alphabet Gacha implements game logic including idle earnings, upgrade purchases, gacha mechanics, and prestige system. The service integrates with AccelByte Gaming Services (AGS) for wallet management, cloud save, and player statistics.
creator: AccelByte

repositories.title: Alphabet Gacha Extend Service
repositories.description: Extend Service Extension app that acts as a game backend for idle + gacha game.

repositories.title: Alphabet Gacha Extend Service
repositories.description: Game client for Alphabet Gacha Extend Service
